page.title: 11ROOKHOPE SCHOOL
page.content: Rookhope Primary School is a small, rural village school which, at present, accommodates thirty-three children aged between four and eleven years of age. Its pupils come from the village itself, two local farms and the village of Eastgate. The school has two classes; Class Two has twelve children aged four to seven years, whilst Class One has twenty-one children aged seven to eleven years old. There are twelve boys and twenty-one girls presently working in the school. School numbers are expected to remain in the middle thirties for several years to come.
